# umlr

A package to:

* Integrate UML diagrams into RMarkdown documents
* Generate UML diagrams from R code

## Installation

You can install the released version of plantumlr from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` {r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("plantumlr")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("grandez/plantumlr")
```
